name: Pegopolis
description: Peg-jumping games are plentiful, but you will not find the breadth and depth of puzzles in other games that you will find in Pegopolis. It includes 64 different puzzles spread across five different puzzle types. You can play a casual game of 'try to clear as many pegs as possible' or a devious game of 'try to draw a picture'. There are even 'Ninja Solitaire' games that you play in reverse to throw a wrench into your pattern-seeking brain. Pegopolis was a hit desktop game back in the 1990's, and now it is back and better than ever!
